participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and outgoing, enjoys helping others and being involved in the community.
participant_1.background: I volunteer in a homeless shelter. I'm a professional wrestler. I like to work out a few times a week. In my spare time, I do volunteer work. I enjoy being around people.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Energetic and competitive, driven to excel in sports and enjoys social gatherings with friends.
participant_2.background: My favorite color is yellow. I love Italian food and garlic bread. I am a gold medalist Olympian. Gymnastics is my favorite sport. I work out four hours a day.

content.text: Hi ! How is your day going ?
Would you let me know about you ?
